title: Find the acceleration of a particle from velocity

content.prompt: A particle moves along the x-axis so that at any time t â‰¥ 0 its velocity is given by  v( t )= t 2 ln( t+2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42E4@ . What is the acceleration of the particle at time t = 6?

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration
